ComponentExtraMetadata.ComponentDescription: A control that performs a countdown  and triggers a specific action after a certain amount of time passes.

ComponentManifest.Description: A control that performs a countdown  and triggers a specific action after a certain amount of time passes.
ComponentManifest.Name: cmp_CircularTimer

CustomProperties.Name: AutoStart
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Whether the timer control automatically starts to play when the user navigates to the screen that contains that control

CustomProperties.Name: DisplayMode
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Whether the control allows user input (Edit), only displays data (View), or is disabled (Disabled)

CustomProperties.Name: Duration
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Duration â€“ How long a timer runs in milliseconds. The maximum is 24 hours expressed in milliseconds. Default is 60 seconds.

CustomProperties.Name: OnTimerStart
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Actions to perform when a timer starts to run

CustomProperties.Name: Repeat
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Whether a timer automatically restarts when it finishes running

CustomProperties.Name: Reset
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Whether a control reverts to its default value

CustomProperties.Name: InnerFill
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A colour of the inner circle

CustomProperties.Name: InnerCircleVisibility
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Steers the visibility of the inner circle to switch between the linear or sector gauge mode

CustomProperties.Name: Font
CustomProperties.Tooltip: The name of the family of fonts in which text appears

CustomProperties.Name: Color
CustomProperties.Tooltip: The color of text in a control

CustomProperties.Name: CircleFill
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A colour of the remaining time gauge

CustomProperties.Name: NullCircleFill
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A colour of the past time gauge

CustomProperties.Name: AutoPause
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Whether the timer control automatically pauses if the user navigates to a different screen
